methods.name: convertUnits
methods.summary: Converts one type of unit to another using the metrics of the main display.
methods.description: As this method does not support percentages, 0 is returned if they are specified.

parameters.name: convertFromValue
parameters.summary:
Measurement and optional unit to convert from, i.e. 160, "120dip".  Percentages are
not accepted.

parameters.name: convertToUnits
parameters.summary: Desired unit for the conversion result.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Initial transformation of the matrix.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Properties to set on a new object, including any defined by <Titanium.UI.3DMatrix> except those marked not-creation or read-only.

properties.name: createWindow
properties.summary: Sets the background color of the master view (when there are no windows or other top-level controls displayed).
properties.description: The default background color may also show through if you use semi-transparent windows.

properties.name: backgroundImage
properties.summary: Local path or URL to an image file for setting a background for the master view (when there are no windows or other top-level controls displayed).
properties.description: The default background image may also show through if you use semi-transparent windows.

properties.name: currentTab
properties.summary: The currently active tab, if a tab group is open.
properties.description: If no tab group is open, this value is undefined.

properties.name: tintColor
properties.summary: Sets the global tint color of the application. It is inherited by the child views and can be overwritten by them using the tintColor property.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts slowly and speeds up.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN_OUT
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts slowly, and speeds up, then slows down at the end of the animation.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_OUT
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that starts quickly, then slows down at the end of the animation.

constants.name: ANIMATION_CURVE_LINEAR
constants.summary: Use with curve to specify an animation that proceeds at a constant rate.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_BACKGROUND_COLOR
constants.summary: Use with type to specify a background color.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_BASELINE_OFFSET
constants.summary: Use with type to apply a different baseline to the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a number to specify how many pixels to raise or lower the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSION
constants.summary: Use with type to stretch the text horizontally.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value to specify how much to stretch the text.

For iOS, the default value is 0.0 and has no minimum/maximum range specified. For Windows, the default value is 0.0 and the valid range is between 0.5 and 1.0.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_FONT
constants.summary: Use with type to specify a font.
constants.description:
Use a Font dictionary for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_FOREGROUND_COLOR
constants.summary: Use with type to specify a font color.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_KERN
constants.summary: Use with type to specify kerning (space between characters).
constants.description:
Set value to a float value specifying how many pixels to increase the character spacing.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LETTERPRESS_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with value to use a letterpress text effect.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_TEXT_EFFECT.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LIGATURE
constants.summary: Use with type to enable or disable ligatures.
constants.description:
Set value to 1 to enable ligatures, else 0 to disable. Ligatures are only supported on certain fonts.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK
constants.summary: Use with type to wrap and truncate the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a Titanium.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_* constant.

See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_CHAR_WRAPPING
constants.summary: Use with value to wrap words at word boundaries.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_CLIPPING
constants.summary: Use with value to set lines to not draw past the edge of the text container.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_HEAD
constants.summary: Use with value to use ellipsis glyph at the beginning of the line for missing text.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_MIDDLE
constants.summary: Use with value to use ellipsis glyph at the middle of the line for missing text.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_TRUNCATING_TAIL
constants.summary: Use with value to use ellipsis glyph at the end of the line for missing text.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK_BY_WORD_WRAPPING
constants.summary: Use with value to wrap words at word boundaries.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_LINE_BREAK.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_LINK
constants.summary: Use with type to create a link.
constants.description:
Set value to a URL.

Use the Label's link event to determine when the user triggers a long press (not a click) event on the linked text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_OBLIQUENESS
constants.summary: Use with type to skew the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value to specify how much to skew the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_PARAGRAPH_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with type to manages the behaviour of string set.
constants.description: Use ParagraphAttribute for the 'value' property in the attribute dictionary. Range for this should be whole string. See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_SHADOW
constants.summary: Use with type to display a shadow behind the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a shadowDict dictionary.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_COLOR
constants.summary: Use with type to change the color of the horizontal line.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with type to place a horizontal line through the text.
constants.description:
Set the value property to a Titanium.UI.ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_* constant.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_COLOR
constants.summary: Use with type to specify a color for the stroke text.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for the value property in the attributes dictionary.

See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_STROKE_WIDTH
constants.summary: Use with type to specify the width of the stroke text.
constants.description:
Set value to a float value specifying the size of stroke width as a percentage of the font size. A positive value displays an outline of the charater, while a negative value fills the character.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_SUBSCRIPT_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with type to place the text in a lower position.
constants.description: See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_SUPERSCRIPT_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with type to place the text in an upper position.
constants.description: See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_TEXT_EFFECT
constants.summary: Use with type to apply a text effect.
constants.description:
Set value to Titainium.UI.ATTRIBUTE_LETTERPRESS_STYLE to apply a letterpress effect to the text.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_BY_WORD
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a line only underneath or through words.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_COLOR
constants.summary: Use with type to change the color of the horizontal line.
constants.description:
Use a color name or hex value for value.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a dashed line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT
constants.summary: Use with value to draw an alternating line of dashes and dots.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DASH_DOT_DOT
constants.summary: Use with value to draw an alternating line of dashes and two dots.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_DOT
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a dotted line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_PATTERN_SOLID
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a solid line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_DOUBLE
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a double line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_NONE
constants.summary: Use with value to not draw a line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_SINGLE
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a single line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_STYLE_THICK
constants.summary: Use with value to draw a thick line.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is either ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE or ATTRIBUTE_STRIKETHROUGH_STYLE.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINES_STYLE
constants.summary: Use with type to place a horizontal line under the text.
constants.description:
Set the value property to a Titanium.UI.ATTRIBUTE_UNDERLINE_* constant.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION
constants.summary: Use with type to control the direction of the text.
constants.description:
Set value to a Titanium.UI.ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_* constant.

See Attribute for more information on type modes.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_EMBEDDING
constants.summary: Use with value to use the embedded text direction.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_LEFT_TO_RIGHT
constants.summary: Use with value to write text left to right.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_NATURAL
constants.summary: Use with value to use the Unicode Bidirection Algorithm rules P2 and P3 to determine which direction to use.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_OVERRIDE
constants.summary: Use with value to override the text direction.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION_RIGHT_TO_LEFT
constants.summary: Use with value to write text right to left.
constants.description:
Use this constant when type is ATTRIBUTE_WRITING_DIRECTION.

See Attribute for more information.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of an address.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS_CITY
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a city name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS_CITY_STATE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a city name combined with a state name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS_LINE1
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of the first line of a street address.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS_LINE2
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of the second line of a street address.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ADDRESS_STATE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a state name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_EXPIRATION_DATE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card expiration date.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_EXPIRATION_DAY
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card expiration day.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_EXPIRATION_MONTH
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card expiration month.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_EXPIRATION_YEAR
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card expiration year.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_NUMBER
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card number.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_CARD_SECURITY_CODE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a card security code.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_COUNTRY_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a country name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_EMAIL
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of an email address.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_FAMILY_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a family name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_GIVEN_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a given name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_JOB_TITLE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a job title.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_LOCATION
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a location, such as a point of interest, an address, or another way to identify a location.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_MIDDLE_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a middle name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_NAME_PREFIX
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a prefix or title, such as 'Dr.'

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_NAME_SUFFIX
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a suffix, such as 'Jr.'

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_NEW_PASSWORD
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a new password.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_NICKNAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a nickname.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ONE_TIME_CODE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a single-factor SMS login code.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_ORGANIZATION_NAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of an organization name.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_PASSWORD
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a password.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_PHONE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a telephone number.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_POSTAL_CODE
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a postal code.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_SUBLOCALITY
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a sublocality.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_URL
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of a URL.

constants.name: AUTOFILL_TYPE_USERNAME
constants.summary: Specifies the expectation of an account or login name.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_ALL
constants.summary: Converts all detectable types of data into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_CALENDAR
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as calendar events into clickable links.
constants.description: Use with the autoLink property. Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_EMAIL_ADDRESSES
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as email addresses into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property. This property will also convert strings formatted as URLs into clickable links.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_MAP_ADDRESSES
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as addresses into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_NONE
constants.summary: Disables converting strings into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_PHONE_NUMBERS
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as phone numbers into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: AUTOLINK_URLS
constants.summary: Converts strings formatted as URLs into clickable links.
constants.description:
Two or more autolink constants can be combined using bitwise or. On iOS: Use with the autoLink property. This property will also convert strings formatted as email addresses into clickable links.

On Android: Use with autoLink, autoLink, and autoLink properties.

constants.name: BLEND_MODE_CLEAR

constants.summary: Use with mode to specify a blend mode.

constants.summary: Use with mode to specify a blend mode.

constants.summary: Use with mode to specify a blend mode.

constants.name: CLIPBOARD_OPTION_EXPIRATION_DATE
constants.summary: Specifies the time and date that you want the system to remove the clipboard items from the clipboard.

constants.name: CLIPBOARD_OPTION_LOCAL_ONLY
constants.summary: Specifies that the clipboard items should not be available to other devices through Handoff.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_ALL
constants.summary: Specifies that all the edges of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_BOTTOM
constants.summary: Specifies that the bottom edge of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_LEFT
constants.summary: Specifies that the left edge of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_NONE
constants.summary: Specifies that none of the edges of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_RIGHT
constants.summary: Specifies that the right edge of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: EXTEND_EDGE_TOP
constants.summary: Specifies that the top edge of the window can extend.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the extendEdges property.

constants.name: FACE_DOWN
constants.summary: Constant value for face-down orientation.
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: FACE_UP
constants.summary: Constant value for face-up orientation.
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: FILL
constants.summary: FILL behavior for UI layout.
constants.description: The FILL behavior means the view will grow its size to fill its parent.

constants.name: HIDDEN_BEHAVIOR_GONE
constants.summary: Release free space when hiding an object.

constants.name: HIDDEN_BEHAVIOR_INVISIBLE
constants.summary: Keeps free space when hiding an object.

constants.name: HINT_TYPE_ANIMATED
constants.summary: Use when creating a TextField to specify the hintType as animated.

constants.name: HINT_TYPE_STATIC
constants.summary: Use when creating a TextField to specify the hintType as static.

constants.name: INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_BEZEL
constants.summary: Use a bezel-style border on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the borderStyle property.

constants.name: INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_LINE
constants.summary: Use a simple line border on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the borderStyle property.

constants.name: INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_NONE
constants.summary: Use no border on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the borderStyle property.

constants.name: INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_ROUNDED
constants.summary: Use a rounded-rectangle border on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the borderStyle property.

constants.name: INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ALWAYS
constants.summary: Always show buttons on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the clearButtonMode, leftButtonMode, and rightButtonMode properties.

constants.name: INPUT_BUTTONMODE_NEVER
constants.summary: Never show buttons on the input field.
constants.description: Use with the clearButtonMode, leftButtonMode, and rightButtonMode properties.

constants.name: INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONBLUR
constants.summary: Show buttons on the input field when it loses focus.
constants.description: Use with the clearButtonMode, leftButtonMode, and rightButtonMode properties.

constants.name: INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONFOCUS
constants.summary: Show buttons on the input field when it gains focus.
constants.description: Use with the clearButtonMode, leftButtonMode, and rightButtonMode properties.

constants.name: INPUT_TYPE_CLASS_NUMBER
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with a number pad only, with the pad keyboard layout. Accepts only numbers.
constants.description: Use with the inputType properties. This overrides any changes keyboardType does to the inputType of the Android device.

constants.name: INPUT_TYPE_CLASS_TEXT
constants.summary: Use an ASCII keyboard, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the inputType properties. This overrides any changes keyboardType does to the inputType of the Android device.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_ALERT
constants.summary: Use a keyboard appearance suitable for entering text on an alert.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_DARK
constants.summary: Use the platform-specific dark keyboard appearance.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_DEFAULT
constants.summary: Use the platform-specific default keyboard appearance.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_LIGHT
constants.summary: Use the platform-specific light keyboard appearance.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_ASCII
constants.summary: Use an ASCII keyboard, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_DECIMAL_PAD
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with decimal numbers only, with the pad keyboard layout.
constants.description:
Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

On iPad, this behaves the same as KEYBOARD_DEFAULT.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_DEFAULT
constants.summary: Use the default keyboard, depending on the platform.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_EMAIL
constants.summary: Use a keyboard suitable for composing email, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_NAMEPHONE_PAD
constants.summary: Use a keyboard suitable for entering names and phone numbers, with the pad keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_NUMBER_PAD
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with a number pad only, with the pad keyboard layout.
constants.description:
Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

On iPad, this behaves the same as KEYBOARD_NUMBERS_PUNCTUATION.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_NUMBERS_PUNCTUATION
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with numbers and punctuation only, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_PHONE_PAD
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with a phone-style number pad, with the pad keyboard layout.
constants.description:
Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

On iPad, this behaves the same as KEYBOARD_NUMBERS_PUNCTUATION.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_TYPE_ASCII
constants.summary: Use an ASCII keyboard, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_TYPE_DECIMAL_PAD
constants.summary: Use a keyboard with decimal numbers only, with the pad keyboard layout.
constants.description:
Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

On iPad, this behaves the same as KEYBOARD_TYPE_DEFAULT. type: Number

Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

On iPad, this behaves the same as KEYBOARD_TYPE_NUMBERS_PUNCTUATION.

Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_TYPE_TWITTER
constants.summary: Use a keyboard optimized for twitter text entry, with easy access to the @ and
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_TYPE_URL
constants.summary: Use a keyboard optimized for entering URLs, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: KEYBOARD_TYPE_WEBSEARCH
constants.summary: Use a keyboard optimized for web search terms and URL entry.
constants.description:
Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties. This type features the space and . characters prominently.

Note: This keyboard automatically sets the return key to "Go" (localized).

constants.name: KEYBOARD_URL
constants.summary: Use a keyboard optimized for entering URLs, with the standard keyboard layout.
constants.description: Use with the keyboardType and keyboardType properties.

constants.name: LANDSCAPE_LEFT
constants.summary: Standard landscape orientation (home button on left).
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: LANDSCAPE_RIGHT
constants.summary: Reverse landscape orientation (home button on right).
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_CHECKMARK
constants.summary: Displays a checkmark on the right side of an item in a list view.
constants.description: Use to indicate an item in a list is selected.

constants.name: LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DETAIL
constants.summary: Displays a detail disclosure button on the right side of an item in a list view.
constants.description: Use to indicate that selecting this item results in the display of a detailed view of that item.

constants.name: LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_DISCLOSURE
constants.summary: Displays a disclosure indicator on the right side of an item in a list view.
constants.description: Use to indicate that selecting this item results in the display of another list, reflecting the next level in the data model hierarchy.

constants.name: LIST_ACCESSORY_TYPE_NONE
constants.summary: Do not display anything on the right side of an item in a list view.

constants.name: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_CONTACTS
constants.summary: A built-in style for an item with a right-aligned title label on the left side of the cell, which is next to a left-aligned subtitle label.
constants.description: The title label value and subtitle label value bind to the title and subtitle properties, respectively, of the data item. If a property is not set, that element is not displayed.

constants.name: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_DEFAULT
constants.summary: A built-in style for an item with an image view and left-aligned title label.
constants.description:
The text label value and image value bind to the title and image properties, respectively, of the data item. If a property is not set, that element is not displayed.

On Android, the image appears on the right side of the cell, and on iOS, the image appears on the left side of the cell.

constants.name: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS
constants.summary: A built-in style for a item with an image view; a left-aligned title label; and a right-aligned subtitle label.
constants.description: The title label value, subtitle label value and image value bind to the title, subtitle and image properties, respectively, of the data item. If a property is not set, that element is not displayed.

constants.name: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE
constants.summary: A built-in style for an item with an image view; a black, left-aligned title label across the top of the cell and a subtitle label below it.
constants.description: The title label value, subtitle label value and image value bind to the title, subtitle and image properties, respectively, of the data item. If a property is not set, that element is not displayed.

constants.name: NOTIFICATION_DURATION_LONG
constants.summary: Specifies a long duration for an Android Toast notification (Titanium.UI.Notification).

constants.name: NOTIFICATION_DURATION_SHORT
constants.summary: Specifies a short duration for an Android Toast notification (Titanium.UI.Notification).

constants.name: PICKER_TYPE_COUNT_DOWN_TIMER
constants.summary: Use a picker with a countdown timer appearance, showing hours and minutes.
constants.description: For an actual countdown timer, the application is responsible for setting a timer to update the picker values.

constants.name: PICKER_TYPE_DATE
constants.summary: Use a date picker.

constants.name: PICKER_TYPE_DATE_AND_TIME
constants.summary: Use a date and time picker.

constants.name: PICKER_TYPE_PLAIN
constants.summary: Use a plain picker (for values other than date or time).

constants.name: PICKER_TYPE_TIME
constants.summary: Use a time picker.

constants.name: PORTRAIT
constants.summary: Orientation constant for portrait mode orientation.
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_CONTINUE
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Continue".
constants.description:
Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

Note: This constant is only available on iOS devices running iOS 9 or later. Older iOS devices will display RETURNKEY_DEFAULT.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_DEFAULT
constants.summary: Use the default return key on the virtual keyboard.
constants.description:
Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

On Android devices, the default return key displays a graphical arrow.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_DONE
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Done".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_EMERGENCY_CALL
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Emergency Call".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_GO
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Go".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_GOOGLE
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Google".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_JOIN
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Join".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_NEXT
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Next".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_ROUTE
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Route".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_SEARCH
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Search".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_SEND
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Send".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: RETURNKEY_YAHOO
constants.summary: Set the return key text to "Yahoo".
constants.description: Use with the returnKeyType and returnKeyType properties.

constants.name: SIZE
constants.summary: SIZE behavior for UI layout.
constants.description: The SIZE behavior means the view will constrain its size fit its contents.

constants.name: TABLE_VIEW_SEPARATOR_STYLE_NONE
constants.summary: The row divider is hidden.

constants.name: TABLE_VIEW_SEPARATOR_STYLE_SINGLE_LINE
constants.summary: The row divider is shown as a single line.

constants.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
constants.summary: Center align text.
constants.description:
Use with the textAlign, textAlign and textAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT_JUSTIFY
constants.summary: Justify align text.
constants.description:
Use with the textAlign, textAlign and textAlign properties.

This constant is a number and only available on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT_LEFT
constants.summary: Left align text.
constants.description:
Use with the textAlign, textAlign and textAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
constants.summary: Right align text.
constants.description:
Use with the textAlign, textAlign and textAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_ALL
constants.summary: Auto-capitalize all text in the input field.
constants.description: Use with the autocapitalization and autocapitalization properties.

constants.name: TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_NONE
constants.summary: Do not auto-capitalize.
constants.description: Use with the autocapitalization and autocapitalization properties.

constants.name: TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_SENTENCES
constants.summary: Use sentence-style auto-capitalization in the input field.
constants.description: Use with the autocapitalization and autocapitalization properties.

constants.name: TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_WORDS
constants.summary: Auto-capitalize the first letter of each word in the input field.
constants.description: Use with the autocapitalization and autocapitalization properties.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_CHAR_WRAP
constants.summary: Add ellipses before the first character that doesnt fit.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_CLIP
constants.summary: Lines are simply not drawn past the edge of the text container.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_END
constants.summary: Add ellipses at the end of the label if the text is too large to fit.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_MARQUEE
constants.summary: Turns on a marquee effect of the label if the text is too large to fit. (This requires Titanium.UI.Label.focusable to be true)
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_MIDDLE
constants.summary: Add ellipses in the middle of the label if the text is too large to fit.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_NONE
constants.summary: Disables ellipsizing of the label. The text will be cut off if it is too long.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_START
constants.summary: Add ellipses at the beginning of the label if the text is too large to fit.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_ELLIPSIZE_TRUNCATE_WORD_WRAP
constants.summary: Add ellipses at word boundaries, unless the word itself doesn't fit on a single line.
constants.description: One of the group of constants for the ellipsize property.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_BODY
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_CALLOUT
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_CAPTION1
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_CAPTION2
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_FOOTNOTE
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_HEADLINE
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_SUBHEADLINE
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_TITLE1
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_TITLE2
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_STYLE_TITLE3
constants.summary: Specifies the text style for the Font Object.
constants.description: One of the group of textStyle constants for the Font Object.

constants.name: TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM
constants.summary: Align text to the bottom of the view.
constants.description:
Use with the verticalAlign and verticalAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
constants.summary: Vertically align text to the center of the view.
constants.description:
Use with the verticalAlign and verticalAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_TOP
constants.summary: Align text to the top of the view.
constants.description:
Use with the verticalAlign and verticalAlign properties.

This constant is a string on Android, and a number on iOS.

constants.name: UNIT_CM
constants.summary: Unit constant representing units in centimeters.

constants.name: UNIT_DIP
constants.summary: Unit constant representing units in density-independent pixels.

constants.name: UNIT_IN
constants.summary: Unit constant representing units in inches.

constants.name: UNIT_MM
constants.summary: Unit constant representing units in millimeters.

constants.name: UNIT_PX
constants.summary: Unit constant representing units in pixels.

constants.name: UNKNOWN
constants.summary: Orientation constant representing an unknown orientation.
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: UPSIDE_PORTRAIT
constants.summary: Orientation constant for inverted portait orientation.
constants.description: One of the group of orientation constants for the Titanium.Gesture module, PORTRAIT, UPSIDE_PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE_LEFT, LANDSCAPE_RIGHT, FACE_UP, FACE_DOWN, and UNKNOWN.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_AUTHENTICATION
constants.summary: Authentication error code reported via error.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_BAD_URL
constants.summary: Bad url error code reported via error.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_CONNECT
constants.summary: Error code reported via error for a failure to connect to host.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_FILE
constants.summary: Error code reported via error for a failure to access a file resource on a host, except "file not found", which has its own constant.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when a requested file does not exist on the host.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_HOST_LOOKUP
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when a host name cannot be resolved, such as via a DNS lookup error.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_REDIRECT_LOOP
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when a redirect loop is detected.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_SSL_FAILED
constants.summary: Error code reported via error for an SSL failure.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_TIMEOUT
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when a timeout occurs.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_UNKNOWN
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when an unknown error occurs.

constants.name: URL_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_SCHEME
constants.summary: Error code reported via error when a url contains an unsupported scheme.
